name: openPhysio
tagline: A project for an open source physiotherapy curriculum.
body:
### Welcome to openPhysio.
This is the home of a project that aims to create a collaborative, open source physiotherapy curriculum that can be reproduced, edited and re-shared by others.

### Authors and Contributors
This project is currently maintained by Michael Rowe, a physiotherapy lecturer at the University of the Western Cape in Cape Town, South Africa.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
